topic.title: Reusable Components for both Web Author/WA Customization

li.p: Click Upload Framework and choose a framework to upload.The framework should be a ZIP or JAR archive that contains exactly one folder. This folder should contain the framework descriptor file (with a .framework or .exf extension) and other supporting files. If the uploaded archive does not have this format you will receive an error that the upload was rejected. If the folder contains both a .framework and .exf file, the .framework file will be used.
Step Result: The framework should appear in the list on this Frameworks page. Uploaded frameworks appear with a light green highlight so that you can identify them easily.

ol.li: Once you are finished with all of your changes, restart the server.
